statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: St. Bonaventure rolls past winless Cornell 81-57
article.headline: St. Bonaventure rolls past winless Cornell 81-57
article.linkText: St. Bonaventure rolls past winless Cornell 81-57
article.story: ST. BONAVENTURE, N.Y. -- Jordan Gathers scored 20 points, while Matthew Wright added 16 with six rebounds and six assists to help St. Bonaventure put away Cornell 81-57 Saturday. The Bonnies (10-4) shot 50 percent from the field and were 10 of 22 on 3-point attempts. Dion Wright had 16 points and Charlon Koof chipped in 12. St. Bonaventure was nursing a 17-14 lead when Matthew Wright and Gathers each hit 3-pointers. Gathers sank two more from beyond the arc during a 15-7 run to take a 10-point lead into the break. The Bonnies pulled away in the second half as Dion Wright had 10 points during a 26-9 surge, pushing the score to 66-41 with 9:41 left. Cornell (0-13) never led in the game and committed 14 turnovers. Nolan Cressler scored 19 points and Devin Cherry contributed 13. The Big Red are on a 19-game losing streak dating back to last season.
